data.title: Sasha & Digweed will be residents for RESISTANCE at Privilege Ibiza
data.meta_description: Ultra's house and techno brand RESISTANCE will be heading to Privilege Ibiza for its debut season on the White Isle this summer. Taking place from Tuesday 25th July to Tuesday 12th September, British legends Sasha & Digweed have also been announced as exclusive residents for six weeks and won't be performing anywhere else on the island this summer.
data.text:
Ultra's house and techno brand RESISTANCE will be heading to Privilege Ibiza for its debut season on the White Isle this summer.

Taking place from Tuesday 25th July to Tuesday 12th September, British legends Sasha & Digweed have also been announced as exclusive residents for six weeks and won't be performing anywhere else on the island this summer.

"After sitting down with the guys from Ultra / RESISTANCE and seeing the incredible plans they have to transform the venue and then seeing rest of the lineups for the shows, I couldn’t have signed up quickly enough," explains Sasha via a press release.

"I’m so excited to be playing these shows with John this summer. When people see the production Resistance are putting into this iconic venue it’s going to blow them away."

A unique concept pioneered by Ultra in 2015, RESISTANCE has fast become known for producing some of the highest quality house and techno experiences around the world.

"To be a part of their first residency in Ibiza is a huge honour and something I am excited to be part of," explains John Digweed on today's announcement.

"The fact that they have chosen the biggest club in Ibiza shows they are intent on making a big noise on the island right from the start. There is no better feeling than playing to a massive room full of people throbbing in unison to your set. Really looking forward to playing alongside Sasha and a host of world class DJs on this night."
